name: Valentine, Warlock
description:
Genre: horror
Content Warnings: gore, death
Summary: Valentine is trying to hide that he is a warlock with links to an eldritch master by pretending that his powers are thanks to his devotion to Jesus instead. In ancient Rome, this alibi doesn't quite work out the way he'd like it to.

Credits:

Story: CrazyCowLady
Music: Weeaboo Overlord
Planning & Testing: the team of NotHack Europa.

Instructions:

You can enter commands to interact with your surroundings. Try to combine the following ACTIONS with the OBJECTS you see around you.

  • pray
  • examine
  • enter
  • open
  • take
  • put
  • touch
  • speak
